title: Did anyone get the online counselling acknowledgement and link?

comments.body: I have the same question, I am thinking of calling them up today, this is seriously some laid back behavior from the management
When i mailed them, they told me i will receive the link a day before the counselling
I have tried calling them like 5-10 times but they never pick up

yeah I got the same mail about link

but they should at least send an acknowledgement that yes we've got your money

You can contact them via the main phone no on the university contact us page, They will connect you to admission. I contacted them today to verify whether they have received the fees or not and they said that they have approved the payments and I will get the counselling link tomorrow
are you talking about this +91 80 26721983 ?

rn its oming out of network coverage,

maybe its the timing, I'll try it out in the morning
It's 9 am to 7 pm
did you get the link?
No did you?

nope,

message me once when you get it, I'll do the same

just for confirmation
Perfect
I got it
Same what is your rank?

151

yours?
1057,that is an amazing rank  did you get any other decent college too?

I got 98.6 %ile in JEE Mains, but I don't think I'll get any better college than PESU with that

other than that I got Mathematics MSc. at Pilani but I want to study CSE and also I'm a dropper so I really don't want a 5 year course
Oh okay nice, hope to bump into you in college
hahaha same
ok im getting nervous,what link is this?
Its the link to join the presentation and counselling
wait is this for ppl outside blore?
Yes, they have an option for attending online counselling
okk thanks. btw do you know their refund policy? are they following UGC?
trust me, with a campus that size, you probably will
I got the link tday
Yeah me too
